Besides, there's Sheel and others... look."},{"lineNumber":257396,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはすでに俺のだ、だが俺はもっと欲しい、いっぱいだ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is already mine, but I want more, a lot."},{"lineNumber":257397,"originalJapaneseLine":"欲深い男だな、まぁいい戻ろう","translatedEnglishLine":"You're a greedy man. the world was occupied by the demon army, and the women connected to Lance also..."},{"lineNumber":257417,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひどい目に合う事態になり、ランスは再び剣を取るが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Suffered terrible fates, and Lance took up his sword again, but..."},{"lineNumber":257418,"originalJapaneseLine":"時すでに遅く・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It was already too late..."},{"lineNumber":257419,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城をうろうろする","translatedEnglishLine":"Wandering around Lance headquarters."},{"lineNumber":257422,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tフロストバインが量産型あてな２号を作っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Frostvine is building the mass-produced Atena Model Castle."},{"lineNumber":257427,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラ、ハンティ、パットン、闘神ゼータ、聖魔教団の話","translatedEnglishLine":"Talk about Sheela, Hunti, Patton, the fighting god Zeta, and the Holy Demon Ark."},{"lineNumber":257432,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス、マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子、ガンジーあたりの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation around Lance, Magic, Urza, Chizuko, and Gandhi."},{"lineNumber":257433,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが戦争初期に優先的にゼスに訪れ魔人ガルティア、魔人メディウサを倒し","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance prioritized visiting Zeth early in the war and defeated the demon lords Galtia and Medusa."},{"lineNumber":257434,"originalJapaneseLine":"また首都も奪還しているのでゼスは比較的安定している","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, they recaptured the capital, so Zeth is relatively stable."},{"lineNumber":257435,"originalJapaneseLine":"　作戦地図を出す場合は、ゼス１／合戦３","translatedEnglishLine":"When displaying the operation map, Zeth 1 / Battle 3."},{"lineNumber":257436,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな何故ランスが来たのか分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone doesn't understand why Lance came."},{"lineNumber":257437,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":257438,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは目的を明かす","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance reveals his purpose."},{"lineNumber":257439,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵のボス、ケイブリス、魔人カミーラに惚れている。","translatedEnglishLine":"He is infatuated with the enemy boss, Kayblis, the demon lord Camilla."},{"lineNumber":257440,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼス方面に他より強力な部隊を送り込んだのはカミーラ奪回の為である","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason for sending a stronger force to the Zeth area is to reclaim Camilla."},{"lineNumber":257441,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラが会話に入り、フォロー","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera joins the conversation and provides support."},{"lineNumber":257442,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラは俺様が過去に退治して、この下、永久地下牢に捕らえている","translatedEnglishLine":"I defeated Camilla in the past and imprisoned her in the permanent underground prison below here."},{"lineNumber":257443,"originalJapaneseLine":"今も居るな、これから牢から出して俺の女にする。","translatedEnglishLine":"She's still there. From now on, I'll release her from the prison and make her mine."},{"lineNumber":257444,"originalJapaneseLine":"前から何度かこっそりこの永久地下牢に忍びこんでやっていたんだけどな","translatedEnglishLine":"I've secretly sneaked into this permanent underground prison several times before."},{"lineNumber":257445,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（千鶴子驚く、マジック、ウルザは知っているか・・同じパーティだったし）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Chizuko is surprised; Magic and Urza know about it... since they were in the same party.)"},{"lineNumber":257446,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして二人でラブラブしている姿をケイブリスに見せつけてやるのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"And we'll show Kayblis how we're lovey-dovey together."},{"lineNumber":257447,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪趣味だ・・・と誰か","translatedEnglishLine":"That's in bad taste... someone says."},{"lineNumber":257448,"originalJapaneseLine":"首都下にある永久地下牢に来た","translatedEnglishLine":"They came to the permanent underground prison beneath the capital."},{"lineNumber":257449,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス、カミーラに勝てたのは運がよかったからだ、解放してはならんぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos says: We were lucky to have defeated Camilla; she must not be released."},{"lineNumber":257450,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより殺せ、さっさと殺せ、あれは危険だ","translatedEnglishLine":"More than that, kill her—kill her quickly. She's dangerous."},{"lineNumber":257451,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、あれはあれで可愛い女だ　と余裕のランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, she's a cute woman in her own way, says a relaxed Lance."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間の経過が遅いと言っても、早く戻って魔人を退治してやらねばな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if time passes slowly, I have to hurry back and defeat the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも同意する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance also agrees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界はつまらん、女がいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This world is boring, there are no women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がいるだろうが・・それにシィルや他にも・・ほれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm here, aren't I...? Besides, there's Sheel and others... look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはすでに俺のだ、だが俺はもっと欲しい、いっぱいだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is already mine, but I want more, a lot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 欲深い男だな、まぁいい戻ろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a greedy man. Well, fine, let's go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界ゲートが開く・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The otherworldly gate opens...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出撃から戻って来たランス、疲れた・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance returned from deployment, tired...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが扇で仰いでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel is fanning him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが来る、参謀本部の方でご主人様にご相談したい事が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta is coming. She has something she wants to consult with the master at the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるから来てほしいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She asked for him to come because of that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・うぐっ、またかよ、めんどくさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ugh, again? What a hassle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、世界を救うためです、がんばって下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Lance, it's to save the world. Please do your best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し考えるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance thinks for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてシィルの手を取り、来いと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he takes Sheel's hand and says, 'Come on...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：戦場を見下ろす丘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Hill overlooking the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとシィル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and Sheel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界が大変な事になったが、もうどうでもいいというランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world is in chaos, but Lance no longer cares.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、お前だけついてこい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel, only you come with me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな感じでｅｎｄ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that's how it ends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モノローグ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monologue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、世界は魔軍に占領され、ランスゆかりの女性達も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, the world was occupied by the demon army, and the women connected to Lance also...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい目に合う事態になり、ランスは再び剣を取るが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suffered terrible fates, and Lance took up his sword again, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時すでに遅く・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was already too late...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城をうろうろする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wandering around Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの司令部が作られた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Kala headquarters was established.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参謀本部で参謀娘達と会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting with the staff daughters at the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フロストバインが量産型あてな２号を作っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Frostvine is building the mass-produced Atena Model 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキア、フェリス、カフェ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sanakia, Felis, Cafe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定．城を飛ばす為の補強工事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting: Reinforcements for flying the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜カード：ビスケッタ、キバ子、あてな＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Cards: Biscetta, Kibako, Atena>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛んでいるランス城をうろうろする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wandering around the flying Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ハンティ、パットン、闘神ゼータ、聖魔教団の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talk about Sheela, Hunti, Patton, the fighting god Zeta, and the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残された遺跡、闘神シグマ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The remaining ruins, fighting god Sigma.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明．ハンティのカラー色、パットンと結婚
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation: Hunti's Kala color, married to Patton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜カード：パットン、ハンティ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Cards: Patton, Hunti>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都　ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Capital - Ragnarok Ark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子、ガンジーあたりの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation around Lance, Magic, Urza, Chizuko, and Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが戦争初期に優先的にゼスに訪れ魔人ガルティア、魔人メディウサを倒し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance prioritized visiting Zeth early in the war and defeated the demon lords Galtia and Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また首都も奪還しているのでゼスは比較的安定している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, they recaptured the capital, so Zeth is relatively stable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦地図を出す場合は、ゼス１／合戦３
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When displaying the operation map, Zeth 1 / Battle 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな何故ランスが来たのか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone doesn't understand why Lance came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは目的を明かす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance reveals his purpose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵のボス、ケイブリス、魔人カミーラに惚れている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is infatuated with the enemy boss, Kayblis, the demon lord Camilla.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス方面に他より強力な部隊を送り込んだのはカミーラ奪回の為である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason for sending a stronger force to the Zeth area is to reclaim Camilla.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが会話に入り、フォロー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera joins the conversation and provides support.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラは俺様が過去に退治して、この下、永久地下牢に捕らえている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I defeated Camilla in the past and imprisoned her in the permanent underground prison below here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も居るな、これから牢から出して俺の女にする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's still there. From now on, I'll release her from the prison and make her mine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前から何度かこっそりこの永久地下牢に忍びこんでやっていたんだけどな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've secretly sneaked into this permanent underground prison several times before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （千鶴子驚く、マジック、ウルザは知っているか・・同じパーティだったし）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Chizuko is surprised; Magic and Urza know about it... since they were in the same party.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして二人でラブラブしている姿をケイブリスに見せつけてやるのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And we'll show Kayblis how we're lovey-dovey together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪趣味だ・・・と誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's in bad taste... someone says.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都下にある永久地下牢に来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They came to the permanent underground prison beneath the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、カミーラに勝てたのは運がよかったからだ、解放してはならんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says: We were lucky to have defeated Camilla; she must not be released.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより殺せ、さっさと殺せ、あれは危険だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than that, kill her—kill her quickly. She's dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、あれはあれで可愛い女だ　と余裕のランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, she's a cute woman in her own way, says a relaxed Lance.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Galtia and Medusa."},{"lineNumber":257434,"originalJapaneseLine":"また首都も奪還しているのでゼスは比較的安定している","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, they recaptured the capital, so Zeth is relatively She's dangerous."},{"lineNumber":257451,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、あれはあれで可愛い女だ　と余裕のランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, she's a cute woman in her own way, says a relaxed Lance."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間の経過が遅いと言っても、早く戻って魔人を退治してやらねばな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if time passes slowly, I have to hurry back and defeat the demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも同意する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance also agrees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界はつまらん、女がいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This world is boring, there are no women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がいるだろうが・・それにシィルや他にも・・ほれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm here, aren't I...? Besides, there's Sheel and others... look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはすでに俺のだ、だが俺はもっと欲しい、いっぱいだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is already mine, but I want more, a lot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 欲深い男だな、まぁいい戻ろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a greedy man. Well, fine, let's go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界ゲートが開く・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The otherworldly gate opens...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出撃から戻って来たランス、疲れた・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance returned from deployment, tired...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルが扇で仰いでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel is fanning him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんが来る、参謀本部の方でご主人様にご相談したい事が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta is coming. She has something she wants to consult with the master at the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるから来てほしいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She asked for him to come because of that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・うぐっ、またかよ、めんどくさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ugh, again? What a hassle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、世界を救うためです、がんばって下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Lance, it's to save the world. Please do your best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し考えるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance thinks for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてシィルの手を取り、来いと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he takes Sheel's hand and says, 'Come on...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：戦場を見下ろす丘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Hill overlooking the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとシィル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and Sheel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界が大変な事になったが、もうどうでもいいというランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world is in chaos, but Lance no longer cares.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、お前だけついてこい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheel, only you come with me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな感じでｅｎｄ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that's how it ends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モノローグ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monologue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、世界は魔軍に占領され、ランスゆかりの女性達も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, the world was occupied by the demon army, and the women connected to Lance also...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい目に合う事態になり、ランスは再び剣を取るが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suffered terrible fates, and Lance took up his sword again, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時すでに遅く・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was already too late...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城をうろうろする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wandering around Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カラーの司令部が作られた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Kala headquarters was established.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参謀本部で参謀娘達と会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting with the staff daughters at the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フロストバインが量産型あてな２号を作っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Frostvine is building the mass-produced Atena Model 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーナキア、フェリス、カフェ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sanakia, Felis, Cafe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定．城を飛ばす為の補強工事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting: Reinforcements for flying the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜カード：ビスケッタ、キバ子、あてな＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Cards: Biscetta, Kibako, Atena>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛んでいるランス城をうろうろする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wandering around the flying Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ハンティ、パットン、闘神ゼータ、聖魔教団の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talk about Sheela, Hunti, Patton, the fighting god Zeta, and the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残された遺跡、闘神シグマ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The remaining ruins, fighting god Sigma.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 説明．ハンティのカラー色、パットンと結婚
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation: Hunti's Kala color, married to Patton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜カード：パットン、ハンティ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Cards: Patton, Hunti>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都　ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Capital - Ragnarok Ark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子、ガンジーあたりの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation around Lance, Magic, Urza, Chizuko, and Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが戦争初期に優先的にゼスに訪れ魔人ガルティア、魔人メディウサを倒し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance prioritized visiting Zeth early in the war and defeated the demon lords Galtia and Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また首都も奪還しているのでゼスは比較的安定している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, they recaptured the capital, so Zeth is relatively stable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦地図を出す場合は、ゼス１／合戦３
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When displaying the operation map, Zeth 1 / Battle 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな何故ランスが来たのか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone doesn't understand why Lance came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは目的を明かす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance reveals his purpose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵のボス、ケイブリス、魔人カミーラに惚れている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is infatuated with the enemy boss, Kayblis, the demon lord Camilla.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス方面に他より強力な部隊を送り込んだのはカミーラ奪回の為である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason for sending a stronger force to the Zeth area is to reclaim Camilla.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが会話に入り、フォロー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera joins the conversation and provides support.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラは俺様が過去に退治して、この下、永久地下牢に捕らえている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I defeated Camilla in the past and imprisoned her in the permanent underground prison below here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も居るな、これから牢から出して俺の女にする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's still there. From now on, I'll release her from the prison and make her mine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前から何度かこっそりこの永久地下牢に忍びこんでやっていたんだけどな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've secretly sneaked into this permanent underground prison several times before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （千鶴子驚く、マジック、ウルザは知っているか・・同じパーティだったし）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Chizuko is surprised; Magic and Urza know about it... since they were in the same party.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして二人でラブラブしている姿をケイブリスに見せつけてやるのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And we'll show Kayblis how we're lovey-dovey together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪趣味だ・・・と誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's in bad taste... someone says.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都下にある永久地下牢に来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They came to the permanent underground prison beneath the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、カミーラに勝てたのは運がよかったからだ、解放してはならんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says: We were lucky to have defeated Camilla; she must not be released.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより殺せ、さっさと殺せ、あれは危険だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than that, kill her—kill her quickly. She's dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、あれはあれで可愛い女だ　と余裕のランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, she's a cute woman in her own way, says a relaxed Lance.
